page.title: 17Henham's nearest railway
page.content: Lying between Henham and Ugley is the London to Cambridge main line railway.This railway carries many commuters from Henham to Liverpool Street Station in London. The nearest station to our area is at Elsenham 1km south of our 12sq.km.Each week 457 passenger trains run through our area.On weekdays 34 trains head north and 43 travel south.The earliest one passes through at 00.35hrs and the latest at 23.30hrs. On Saturdays 24 trains go in each direction with the earliest and latest at the same times as on weekdays.On Sundays only 12 trains travel in each direction the earliest at 00.49hrs and the latest at 23.48hrs.During 1985 the line is being electrified to cope with the extra trains neede now Stansted Airport is to be expanded.A Day return ticket from Elsenham to LOndon costs Â£4.50.
